Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class PowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PowerUp
  • public class PowerUp
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the powerUp card, which contains a list of effects. Each powerup has its unique ID (an integer)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AmmoColor color
      the color of the powerUp (on of the three spawn point colors)
      private java.lang.String description
      a description of the powerup
      private java.util.List<Effect> effects
      the list of effects of the powerup.
      private java.lang.String name
      the name of the powerup
      private int powerUpID
      the unique ID of the powerup
      private PowerUpType type
      the type of the powerUp.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PowerUp​(AmmoColor color, PowerUpType type, java.lang.String name)
      Builds the powerup specifing color, type and name.

    • Field Detail

      • color

        private AmmoColor color
        the color of the powerUp (on of the three spawn point colors)

      • type

        private PowerUpType type
        the type of the powerUp. It indicates when it can be used.

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        the name of the powerup

      • description

        private java.lang.String description
        a description of the powerup

      • effects

        private java.util.List<Effect> effects
        the list of effects of the powerup. Each effect corresponds to an interaction with the user.

      • powerUpID

        private int powerUpID
        the unique ID of the powerup

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerUp

        public PowerUp​(AmmoColor color,
               PowerUpType type,
               java.lang.String name)
        Builds the powerup specifing color, type and name. Used in tests only.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the powerup
        type - type of the powerup
        name - name of the powerup

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public AmmoColor getColor()
        Gets the color of the powreup
        Returns:
        one of the three spawnpoint colors

      • getType

        public PowerUpType getType()
        Gets the type of the powerup. There are three possible types, depending on the moment it can be used: ACTION, TAGBACK, TARGETING
        Returns:
        an element of the enum PowerUpType.

      • setPowerUpID

        public void setPowerUpID​(int powerUpID)
        Gets the unique identifier of the powerup
        Parameters:
        powerUpID - an integer which is the uniwue identifier

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gets a description string of the content of the powerup (which is unique, too)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string with ID, name and color

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the powerup
        Returns:
        the name

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the description of the powerup (what it does and how to use it)
        Returns:
        a string with the description

      • getEffects

        public java.util.List<Effect> getEffects()
        Gets the list of the effects
        Returns:
        a clone of the list (so any modify does not affect the original list).
